limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum number of documents to send. [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#limit)

count.name: count
count.description: Set to true to return count instead of documents. [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#count)

conditions.name: conditions
conditions.description: Set the conditions used to find or remove the document(s). [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#conditions)

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Set the fields by which to sort. [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#sort)

distinct.name: distinct
distinct.description: Set to a path name to retrieve an array of distinct values. [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#distinct)

hint.name: hint
hint.description: Add an index hint to the query (must be enabled per controller). [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#hint)

comment.name: comment
comment.description: Add a comment to a query (must be enabled per controller). [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#comment)

select.name: select
select.description: Select which paths will be returned by the query. [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/Query-String-Parameters#select)

X-Baucis-Update-Operator.name: X-Baucis-Update-Operator
X-Baucis-Update-Operator.description: **BYPASSES VALIDATION** May be used with PUT to update the document using $push, $pull, or $set. [doc](https://github.com/wprl/baucis/wiki/HTTP-Headers)
